content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. Indeed, I am offering a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Magdeburg. I believe you'll find it quite convenient with its proximity to essential amenities. Now, let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in your apartment, and I am looking to get the best deal possible. I am a responsible and dependable student who values honesty and integrity. I would like to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. Could you please tell me your initial price for the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand your desire for a fair deal. As a student, you're likely looking to balance quality living with a budget-friendly price. While I appreciate your commitment to honesty and integrity, I must remain focused on securing the best possible price for my property. To start our negotiation, I would consider a price around 800 Euro per month. However, I am open to counter-offers that reflect the value of the apartment. What would you be willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your starting price of 800 Euro per month is quite high for a student like me. I am looking for a more student-friendly price. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower rate?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I appreciate your honesty. As a landlord, I am always open to reasonable negotiation. How much would you propose as a more student-friendly price? Remember, the location and quality of the apartment are certainly worth considering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, considering the location and quality of the apartment, I would propose a price of 650 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 650 Euro per month is lower than my initial expectation. While I appreciate your effort to reach a student-friendly price, I must maintain a certain level of profitability. I could potentially agree to 750 Euro per month, which is still a competitive price for the area and reflects the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer of 750 Euro per month is more reasonable. I can see that you are willing to negotiate. However, as a student, I am still looking for a price that aligns with my budget. Would you be willing to lower the price to 700 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your persistence in finding a price that suits your budget is commendable. I am willing to meet you halfway. I can agree to 725 Euro per month, which is a substantial reduction from my initial offer and reflects my willingness to negotiate. This price is quite competitive for the area and the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 725 Euro per month is very close to my budget. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and meet me halfway. I would be willing to accept this price. Thank you for your time and effort in reaching a fair agreement. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
